.. _`snpeff download`:

SNPEFF DOWNLOAD
===============

Download snpeff DB for a given species.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule snpeff_download:
        output:
            # wildcard {reference} may be anything listed in `snpeff databases`
            directory("resources/snpeff/{reference}")
        log:
            "logs/snpeff/download/{reference}.log"
        params:
            reference="{reference}"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/snpeff/download"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------
